## About me
 
I'm a PhD student specializing in agent-based modeling and massive evacuation at UMR 6266 IDEES, based in Rouen, Normandy. Before beginning my PhD, I worked as a Project Engineer at the same laboratory. I hold a Master's degree in Remote Sensing from Rennes University.
